DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Men woman age 1865 year Patients DSMIV define schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder Treated atypical antipsychotic least 2 month Patients document weight gain > 7 % current antipsychotic medication Able provide write consent Exclusion criterion Women pregnant nursing . Female participant must negative urine pregnancy test screening .
